background.name: Background
background.description: Basically, the background color palette was increased and several responsive utilities were added.

custom.name: Custom colors
custom.description: Increase the color palette of backgrounds.

striped.name: Striped colors
striped.description: Striped background colors inspired from progress bar component.

opacity.description: Standard and new background colors with opacity in the range from 0.1 to 0.9.
opacity.name: Opacity colors

state.description: State backgrounds inspired from Bootstrap alerts and can be used to identify block state.
state.name: State colors

hover.description: Change background colors only by hover or focusing on element.
hover.name: Hover colors

hover_opacity.description: Background hover colors with opacity in the range from 0.1 to 0.9.
hover_opacity.name: Opacity hover colors

contain.description: This utility implements background-size: contain css style which can change size of background image to scale the width and height in an element.
contain.name: Contain size

cover.description: Mostly used for creating full width hero headers with background image and implements background-size: cover css style.
cover.name: Image full width

badge.name: Badge
badge.description: More colors and shape of the badges.

border.name: Border
border.description: More border styles, sizes, increased color palette and responsive styles.

custom.description: New border colors not used by default.
custom.name: Custom colors

hover.description: All border colors by hover and focus on element.
hover.name: Hover colors

opacity.description: Default and custom border colors with opacity in the range from 0.1 to 0.9.
opacity.name: Opacity colors

hover_opacity.description: Border colors with opacity by hover or focus on element in the range from 0.1 to 0.9.
hover_opacity.name: Opacity hover colors

responsive.description: Responsive border visibility to all directions.
responsive.name: Responsive

style.description: Change border style with useful classes.
style.name: Styles

rounded_pill.description: Add ellipsis border radius with specific direction.
rounded_pill.name: Rounded pill positions

rounded_0.description: Remove border radius with specific direction.
rounded_0.name: Rounded 0 positions

breadcrumb.name: Breadcrumb
breadcrumb.description: Do not limit yourself to just standard breadcrumbs and get the opportunity to use breadcrumbs with other components.

color.description: Change breadcrumb background color, link and divider color, inspired by navbar component.
color.name: Styles

pill.description: Recommended to use breadcrumb pill style instead of rounded-pill utility for a better view.
pill.name: Pill

arrow.description: Replace predefined separator of breadcrumb just by arrows.
arrow.name: Arrow dividers

size.description: Responsive breadcrumb sizes for different devices.
size.title: Breadcrumb sizes
size.name: Sizes

button.name: Button
button.description: Responsive button sizes, custom colors and shapes can make buttons special and recognizable.

custom.description: More contextual button colors diversify their place of application.
custom.name: Custom colors

outline.description: Modern outline buttons implementation with more range of colors.
outline.name: Custom outline colors

hover.description: Change button color on hover just with add custom class.
hover.name: Hover colors

active.description: Make any button variant active style.
active.name: Active colors

3d.description: 3D buttons inspired by Lumen Bootswatch template.
3d.name: 3D

opacity.description: Transparent buttons with opacity in the range from 0.1 to 0.9.
opacity.name: Opacity colors

state.description: State buttons inspired by alert component colors and can add additional contextual sense.
state.name: State colors

size.description: Standard buttons can change only 3 sizes without responsive behavior, with this component you can do it now.
size.title: Button sizes
size.name: Sizes

circle.description: Circle buttons inspired by material design buttons.
circle.name: Circle

pill.description: Pill buttons better than rounded-pill utility, because they can work with button groups.
pill.name: Pill

card.name: Card
card.description: Additional card components directions, card sizing and lot more.

footer_pills.description: Standard card nav pill work only with header, now it can be done with footer.
footer_pills.name: Footer pills

footer_tabs.description: Add nav tabs to card footer easily.
footer_tabs.name: Footer tabs

image_left.description: Align the image to the left of the card body.
image_left.title: Card image left
image_left.name: Image left

image_right.description: Align the image to the right of the card body.
image_right.title: Card image right
image_right.name: Image right

size.description: Responsive card and card components size is possible to change now.
size.title: Card sizes
size.name: Sizes

dropdown.name: Dropdown
dropdown.description: Your dropdown menu may be more flexible and convenient than you can imagine.

arrow.description: Add arrows to any dropdown menu.
arrow.name: Arrows

disable_caret.description: Sometimes is needed to change standard dropdown caret icon and no easy way to do it up to this point.
disable_caret.name: Disable caret

hover.description: Dropdown on hover has been deleted from a while ago in favor of mobile devices, but we returned this opportunity.
hover.title: Dropdown hover
hover.name: Hover

mega_menu.description: Mega menu is very popular for magazines web apps as a showcase of products and categories.
mega_menu.name: Mega menu

menu_size.description: Change dropdown menu size on all devices by adding additional classes.
menu_size.title: Dropdown menu sizes
menu_size.name: Menu sizes

scrollable_menu.description: Sometimes dropdown menu is too long and very useful to limit number of items.
scrollable_menu.name: Scrollable menu

flex.name: Flex
flex.description: More complex flex utilities and simpler class names.

align.description: Magic combination of display: flex, justify-content and align-items in simple classes.
align.title: Flex align
align.name: Align

align_content.description: Align multiple flex elements using short classes.
align_content.title: Flex align content
align_content.name: Align content

font.name: Font
font.description: Now you can manage the style of your font on different devices with minimal effort, enjoy the development.

size.description: Manage font sizes on multiple devices.
size.title: Font sizes
size.name: Sizes

weight.description: Set the font weight for specific device.
weight.title: Font weights
weight.name: Weights

form.name: Form
form.description: Your form may take on an unusual style and be used with more components than before.

input_dark.description: Add modern dark input to your forms.
input_dark.name: Input dark

input_material.description: Inspired by google material design forms.
input_material.name: Input material

input_color.description: Additional form input colors by changing the class.
input_color.name: Input colors

input_opacity.description: Input color classes with opacity in the range from 0.1 to 0.9.
input_opacity.name: Input opacity colors

input_size.description: Form input sizes replaced by number start with 1 and text sizes like sm, md, lg replaced by responsive breakpoints.
input_size.name: Input sizes

switch_reverse.description: Modify default switch position by adding simple class.
switch_reverse.name: Switch reverse

grid.name: Grid
grid.description: Why confine yourself to small screens and standard sizes of columns, rows and containers, you deserve more.

wide_container_responsive.description: Responsive container sizes for wide screens.
wide_container_responsive.name: Wide responsive containers

container_size.description: Modify container size for specific device.
container_size.name: Container sizes

row_size.description: Manage margin between columns by row sizes.
row_size.title: Grid row sizes
row_size.name: Row sizes

column_size_wide.description: More and more people has large screen sizes and your web app must be prepared for this.
column_size_wide.name: Wide column sizes

gutter_spacing.description: Add grid padding and margin utilities matching to grid columns padding.
gutter_spacing.title: Grid gutter spacing
gutter_spacing.name: Gutter spacing

size.description: Change list group items padding, font size and border radius by adding class.
size.name: Sizes

item_size.description: Modify specific list group item padding, border radius, font size by adding class.
item_size.name: Item sizes

horizontal_flush.description: Horizontal list group without top and bottom borders.
horizontal_flush.name: Horizontal flush

striped.description: Striped list group item colors inspired by table striped component.
striped.name: Striped

nav.name: Nav
nav.description: Responsive nav sizes, tabs directions, material design like nav and nav tree.

size.description: Change nav size by adding class.
size.name: Sizes

navbar.name: Navbar
navbar.description: See what you can do with your navbar using the new classes for different needs.

nav_align_left.description: Align nav to the left of navbar.
nav_align_left.name: Nav align left

nav_align_right.description: Align nav to the left of navbar.
nav_align_right.name: Nav align right

nav_size.description: Change nav size by adding class for different devices.
nav_size.name: Nav sizes

size.description: Change navbar height, font size, brand size and other components by adding class.
size.name: Sizes

padding_vertical.description: Add body top and bottom padding by adding class.
padding_vertical.name: Fixed body padding

tribar.description: Modern navbar toggler icon with animation and without image.
tribar.name: Toggler triple bar

pagination.name: Pagination
pagination.description: More diverse pagination is now without much effort and development.

size.description: Change pagination size by adding class on different devices.
size.name: Sizes

position.name: Position
position.description: Change of position has never been so easy and quick.

spacing.description: Set absolute and fixed position value.
spacing.name: Sizes

progress.name: Progress
progress.description: You have now ability to change progress size or orientation, this gives you more freedom and predefined classes.

size.description: Responsive progress bar height, padding and font size.
size.name: Sizes

scrollspy.name: ScrollSpy
scrollspy.description: Discover all the power of scrollspy and get smart scrolling now.

tree.description: Show nested nav elements using scrollspy tree.
tree.name: Tree

sidebar.name: Sidebar
sidebar.description: A completely new component in the best traditions of Bootstrap taking inspiration from the navbar component.

color.description: Change sidebar color by adding class very similar to navbar.
color.name: Colors

expand.description: Control sidebar text visibility on multiple devices.
expand.name: Responsive visibility

size.description: Change sidebar size on different devices by adding class.
size.name: Sizes

nav_size.description: Control specified sidebar nav sizes on any device.
nav_size.name: Nav sizes

size.name: Size
size.description: Useful utilities for adjusting the width and height of blocks and components.

full.description: Change width and height of element by adding simple class.
full.name: Full width and height

text.name: Text
text.description: Text utilities received new color schemes and various color modifications.

custom.description: Additional text colors from extended color palette.
custom.name: Custom colors

opacity.description: Text colors with opacity in the range from 0.1 to 0.9.
opacity.name: Opacity colors

hover.description: Change text color on hover or focus.
hover.name: Hover colors

hover_opacity.description: Modify text color on hover or focus with opacity in the range from 0.1 to 0.9.
hover_opacity.name: Opacity hover colors

state.description: Text state colors inspired by alert component.
state.name: State colors

tribar.name: Triple bar
tribar.description: Modern hamburger menu with a variety of color choices and the ability to change the icon depending on the status of the menu.
Animated hamburger triple bar icon without image, only css.
tribar.name: Icon without image

color.description: Custom colors for triple bar icon component.
color.name: Colors

type.name: Typography
type.description: Hidden responsive features of text elements.

heading_responsive.description: Manage heading size on different devices.
